title: Science-Themed Learning Activity Design and Web Resource Utilization Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: A project-based science education course providing dynamic web resources via the Learning Activity Management System (LAMS).

learning_goals: Learners can design learning activities aligned with scientific topics using LAMS.
Learners can navigate and analyze linked data-based web resources to integrate them into projects.
Learners can complete and evaluate team-based science projects in a smartphone environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
